testcase.name: User completes a successful login using phone number - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the lidl.de login page..................................passed Given I click on the login button...........................................passed When I submit my correct phone "+40730688901"...............................passed And I submit my correct password "Mercia321!"...............................passed Then I should be redirected to My Lidl Account..............................passed
